dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: How fortunate is the world to have such a wonderful person?

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: No, how unfortunate is the world to be plagued with so many defects pretending to be human?

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: Meeting the One Who Grips opened my eyes. I had been living a blasé life, ignoring those foul stenches prevalent in the streets!

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: The voice of the One Who Grips upturns my foolish thoughts and cultivates the right mindset.

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: Ever since my first calling as a hammer, it was the voice of the One that soothed me with each swing!

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: Ahh, why was I ever scared to destroy the impure?

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: Why didn’t I notice sooner that those impure beings are tainting the soil they trample on!

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: My beautiful hometown wasn’t safe from those defiled… heretics, who roam freely without a hint of shame!

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: On my first week of becoming a Mittelhammer, I pleaded to the One Who Grips that I wish to right the degenerate future of my dear home!

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: The One Who Grips had blessed me with a merciful smile as always.

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: Aah, I knew it, I must be the chosen one!

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: That night, many towers were made out of Backstreets dwellers.

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: Ohh, sorry. Those who were ‘heretics’, to be exact!

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: To see them pierced and hung far from the earth… It brought me such joy.

dataList.title: N Corp. Mittelhammer
dataList.content: Why, I could just kiss the cleansed soil of my dear hometown.
